extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • extractingMetricsFrom

        public AbstractMetricsReportingExecutionListenerBuilder<T> extractingMetricsFrom(MetricsCollectingExecutionListener delegate)
        Instructs the new reporter to use the given delegate as is source of metrics.

        If this method is not called, a newly-allocated MetricsCollectingExecutionListener will be used.

        Parameters:
        delegate - the ReadsReportingExecutionListener to use as metrics source.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining).

      • expectingTotalEvents

        public AbstractMetricsReportingExecutionListenerBuilder<T> expectingTotalEvents(long expectedTotal)
        The total number of expected events.

        If this number is set, the reporter will also print a percentage of the overall progression.

        Parameters:
        expectedTotal - the total number of expected events.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • withScheduler

        public AbstractMetricsReportingExecutionListenerBuilder<T> withScheduler(ScheduledExecutorService scheduler)
        Use the given scheduler to schedule periodic reports.

        If this method is not called, a default scheduler is created.

        Parameters:
        scheduler - the scheduler to use.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • withLogSink

        public AbstractMetricsReportingExecutionListenerBuilder<T> withLogSink(LogSink sink)
        Use the given LogSink to log messages.

        If this method is not called, then a default log sink is used.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
